overview:
Vivian Chen is an entrepreneur, investor, property developer, and hotelier based in Los Angeles.

Ms. Chen invests with venture capital funds and projects that focus on hospitality technology, travel, music, and entertainment. In addition, she is also integral in the tactical and strategic positioning of various privately held hotel-related real estate investment and development companies. Vivian is an investor owner of an eco resort master plan development in Costa Rica. She oversees a real estate holding company and other business ventures.
